scripts.test:watch: watchexec -e purs,js,yaml,rb -- spago bundle --outfile output/bundle.js --module Test.Main && mocha output/bundle.js
scripts.build: rm -rdf dist && eslint src && spago build --censor-stats --strict --ensure-ranges --pedantic-packages && vite build
scripts.production:build: spago build && purs-backend-es build && vite build
